description: This file defines the 'Referral' class in Dart, representing referral data with fields for userId, code, and rewards. It includes serialization (fromJson and toJson) methods and is intended as a data model within a Flutter application.

classes.name: Referral
classes.description: An immutable data class representing referral data with fields for userId, code, and rewards, including JSON serialization methods.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Constructs a Referral instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts a Referral instance into a JSON map.
